message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $9500. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an item valued at $8000 to you, while also ensuring a fair profit for me. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider my counteroffer?
